NOTES:
This is a re-encode of Kamera&#039;s and bald&#039;s releases......Video on both are pretty good anf the audio on balds was good for direct audio.
Balds had subs missing for part near the end when they speak french/german (whatever it is)....also there was a scene missing aswell.
Overall balds was slightly better hence the reason it&#039;s the bulk of this re-encode.


WORK DONE:
Firstly i stripped the audio of Balds and remastered it in adob audition3.0....and then saved it in AC3.
Then i needed to take the intro of Kamera&#039;s release due to it being missing on balds and i also had to take a scene off Kamera&#039;s release aswell,has balds was
cut short for some reason???
Now i needed to remux the new audio with balds release....and then insert the missing scenes taken from kameras into the bald release....
